com.mapgroup.classificator.database.dialects

Class TableSchema

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mapgroup.classificator.database.dialects.TableSchema
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    TableSchemaMySql, TableSchemaPG

    public abstract class TableSchema
extends java.lang.Object
    Abstract class which models the database table's structure retrieving important information from the DBMS and creating a mapping between the programming language's type and the SQL types.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  TableSchema.Column
      Class which defines the structure of each column with some information about the type and the name of the attribute contained in it.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private java.util.List<TableSchema.Column> tableSchema
      List of all the columns of the table analyzed

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      TableSchema(java.lang.String tableName)
      Constructs the structure of the specified database's table which as name the specified value tableName.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      protected abstract void createTypeMapping(java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> mapSQL_JAVATypes)
      Defines the mapping between the SQL types and the JAVA types according to the specific DBMS rules.
      java.util.List<java.lang.String> getAttributeNames()
      Returns the columns' list of names present in this table.
      java.util.List<java.lang.String> getAttributeTypes()
      Returns the list of all the types used in the current table.
      TableSchema.Column getColumn(int index)
      Retrieves specific information about the column in position defined by the specified index.
      int getNumberOfAttributes()
      Returns the number of attributes present in this table.

    • Field Detail

      • tableSchema

        private final java.util.List<TableSchema.Column> tableSchema
        List of all the columns of the table analyzed

    • Constructor Detail

      • TableSchema

        TableSchema(java.lang.String tableName)
      throws java.sql.SQLException
        Constructs the structure of the specified database's table which as name the specified value tableName.

        The structure of the table is retrieved using the metadata content of the current database.

        Parameters:
        tableName - the table that will be analyzed
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - - if some errors occurred querying the database

    • Method Detail

      • createTypeMapping

        protected abstract void createTypeMapping(java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> mapSQL_JAVATypes)
        Defines the mapping between the SQL types and the JAVA types according to the specific DBMS rules.
        Parameters:
        mapSQL_JAVATypes - data structure used to grant the mapping

      • getAttributeNames

        public java.util.List<java.lang.String> getAttributeNames()
        Returns the columns' list of names present in this table.

        Each column represent a specific attribute, so the column's name represents the attribute's name.

        Returns:
        attribute's list of names

      • getAttributeTypes

        public java.util.List<java.lang.String> getAttributeTypes()
        Returns the list of all the types used in the current table.
        Returns:
        list of available types

      • getColumn

        public TableSchema.Column getColumn(int index)
        Retrieves specific information about the column in position defined by the specified index.
        Parameters:
        index - position of the column selected
        Returns:
        the column selected

      • getNumberOfAttributes

        public int getNumberOfAttributes()
        Returns the number of attributes present in this table.
        Returns:
        the number of attributes
